Speaker: Ying Li
Line: The legend of the ten rings has been told for thousands of years. Every generation, the story grows. But at its centre there is always one man.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Some say he found the rings in a crater or stole them from a tomb. They gave him the strength of a god, and the gift of eternal life.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: He could have used them for good.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: But all he wanted… was power.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: He called his army The Ten Rings. Over the centuries, they spread into every corner of the world.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: They moved in the shadows…

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Toppled governments… And changed the course of history.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: He chased money and power for a thousand years. But he still wanted more.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Have you heard the legend of Ta Lo. A hidden village with mythical creatures and ancient magic. Where people practise a martial arts style from the gods. I want to find it.

Speaker: Subordinate
Line: Of course. I’ll send a scout to explore the area, and come back with more information.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: I want to go now.

Speaker: Subordinate
Line: The forest… is moving.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: He had nothing left on Earth to conquer. That’s when he came for my home.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Where’s the entrance to Ta Lo.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: You’re not welcome in our village.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: You don’t know who you’re talking to.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: I don’t care who you are. Turn around now, and I won’t have to hurt you.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Is that all.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: That was the first time I met your father.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: He was the last person I thought I’d fall for. But love had other plans.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Shang-Chi, there’s much more to know about the legend of the rings, but you’ll learn about that when you’re older.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: If Dad’s rings were so powerful, how did you beat him.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Where I’m from, we are empowered by the magic of the Great Protector. When you have the heart of our dragon, you can do some amazing things.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Can you still do those things.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: I left those powers in Ta Lo with our dragon, but what I got in return is so much better.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: I want you to have this. Whenever you feel lost, this will help you find your way home. Can you remember that.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Okay.

Line: Hello, sir, welcome to the Fairmont…

Line: I’m driving.

Line: I knew Katy was trouble the first day we met in high school. I was getting picked on a lot, for all the reasons we all get picked on a lot. Plus, I had just moved to the US, so I was struggling with my English, and I was on my way to lunch one day when this guy who was like twice my size yells at me from down the hall, “What’s up, Gangnam Style.”. So I yelled back, “I’m not Korean, idiot.”

Speaker: Katy
Line: And I turn the corner, and I see this guy drop his backpack, he’s getting all up in his face…

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: And right before he was about to throw the first punch, Katy comes out of nowhere, steps right between us and starts screaming the lyrics to Hotel California.

Line: Names are sacred, Ruiwen. They connect us not only to ourselves, but to everyone who came before. A funny story. Some years ago, a terrorist from America needed a boogeyman to bring your country to its knees. So, he appropriated The Ten Rings. My Ten Rings. But because he didn’t know my actual name, he invented a new one. Do you know the name he chose. The Mandarin. He gave his figurehead the name of a chicken dish. And it worked. America was terrified. Of an orange.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: The truth is, I’ve had many names throughout my life. The Warrior King, Master Khan, the most dangerous man on Earth. For years, I thought that was all I was meant to be. But when I met their mother, everything changed.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: She showed me a part of myself I didn’t know was there. It was like I was seeing the world for the first time.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: She gave up everything so we could be together. And so did I.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: You know who’s in there. Say, “Hello, little sister.”

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: After all those years, I finally found something worth growing old for. My real name is Wenwu. She was the only one who called me that. And when she died… I was lost for many years. But I’m not lost any more. When you children ran away, I was so desperate to connect with your mother, I threw myself back into the studies of her village. The legendary Ta Lo. I wasn’t able to find the secret path to the village entrance, but I did find what they are hiding. There’s a gate deep in their mountains. Your mother is waiting for us there. I know this is a lot. I might not have believed it if she didn’t tell me herself.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: What are you talking about.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: I was sitting right here in this seat, deep in my research… and she spoke to me. It was like she was standing in this room. I could feel her breath on my cheek and her hand on my back. She told me she needs my help.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: To do what.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: To save her from her people. After we fell in love, your mother wanted us to live in Ta Lo. She asked permission from the elders, and they refused. They said I wasn’t worthy. She would still be with us. We would all be living there together. Ta Lo did this to us. They locked her behind that gate to punish her. Don’t you see. She’s leaving clues for us. She wants us to find her and bring her home, so we can be a family again.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Dad, Mom’s gone. She’s not talking to you from behind a gate, and she’s not leaving any clues for us.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Then what are these.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: The passage to Ta Lo is guarded by a moving maze. But there’s a direct path through the forest that only opens once a year on Qingming Jie. To get through, you need to know the route and the exact time it opens. Now I know both. Three days from now, we will rescue my wife from her prison and bring her home.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: This is why you’re here. To help me bring her back to us.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: And what happens if they don’t let you open the gate.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: We’ll burn the village to the ground.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: What. You can’t just march into our mom’s village with this bullshit. I mean, do you have any idea how insane…

Speaker: Katy
Line: Hey.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Where are you taking me.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: When will you stop pretending. Lock them up.

Speaker: Dweller-in-Darkness
Line: It’s okay, my dear. We’re all going to be together Soon.

Speaker: Katy
Line: So, um, pretty confused right now, because, uh, initially I thought your dad should definitely see a therapist for his delusions, but then that dragon vomited a magical water map, and now I have no idea what’s real. Is what he said about your mom’s village true.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: She used to tell us stories about Ta Lo when we were kids. A village in another dimension full of magical creatures. I thought it was just a fairy tale.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: What if Dad’s right.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: About Mom being locked behind a gate by her own people.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Crazier things have turned out to be true.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Look, I don’t know what the hell is going on, but if we don’t find a way to get to Ta Lo before him, he’s gonna destroy everything that’s left of our family.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: This family was destroyed a long time ago.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: The hell was that.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Oh.

Speaker: Katy
Line: You’re going toward that noise.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: “Wake Duncan with thy knocking. “Oh, I would’st though could’st. “My deed ’twere best not…” Oh, hello, loves. What year is it.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Who are you.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Trevor. Slattery. The actor from Liverpool. Wait. Are you the governor’s kids. I’ve been preparing a monologue for your homecoming dinner. Oh. Where’s she going.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Why are you down here.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Well, some time ago, I was offered the role of a terrorist. I know, facile, trite, I couldn’t agree more. But times were lean, you know what I mean. Anyway, the producer told me he worked for the BBC. But, ironic twist, it turns out he, in fact, was a terrorist, and I wasn’t playing a character at all, but what I now recognise to be a rather unflattering portrait of your father. We all got our just deserts. The producer got blown up by Iron Man, and I served time in federal prison, which turned out to be the best thing for me. I got clean, I rediscovered my passion.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Then my dad broke you out.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Exactly.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: To kill you.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Exactly. But just as his men were tying me up for my execution, I launched into a performance of my Macbeth. “Whence is that knocking. Wake Duncan with thy knocking. I would’st though could’st…” They couldn’t get enough of it. I’ve been doing weekly gigs for the lads ever since.

Speaker: Katy
Line: So you’re like his jester.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: I can give you a quick preview if you like. “Nuncle, nuncle, nuncle…”

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Uh, thank you, Trevor. I think we’re okay. Right now, we really just need to find a way to…

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: What the hell.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What the… Oh.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Whoa. What is that.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: What’s what.

Speaker: Katy
Line: That. What is that.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: That. That. That.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: You can see Morris.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Morris.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Oh, Morris. They can see you. You’re real. All this time I thought I was hallucinating him. Oh, this is such fab news.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Where’s his face.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: He’s a bit sensitive about that.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Oh. Really. Morris says he knows who you are.

Speaker: Katy
Line: It talks… It talks to you.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: If he didn’t talk to me, I’d have gone mad yonks ago.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: How would he know me.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: He says he grew up with your mum. In Ta Lo. Apparently, your father picked him up in some magic forest on one of his expeditions to find the entrance.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: He wants you to take him home.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Believe me, buddy, I would if I knew how. According to my dad, the path there only opens once a year.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Oh.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Morris says he can guide you there right now. You can get through the maze without waiting for the path to open. But, and it’s a big “but,” it’s very dangerous.

Speaker: Katy
Line: How dangerous.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: No one’s ever made it out alive. But Morris is 90% confident he can guide us through safely.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Look, I’ve done dumber things with worse odds. But even if that chicken-pig is right…

Speaker: Katy
Line: …we’re still locked in your…

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Whew.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: How did you…

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Dad has a tunnel system under the whole compound. That’s how I escaped last time.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Oh.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: This will take us straight to the garage.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Oh, my God. I kinda like this guy.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Just head up that ramp and through the front gate. Should be a straight shot. Figure we got about 30 seconds until he…

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Do you mind. I get sick in the back. Carsick.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: That’s my car.

Speaker: Katy
Line: God damn it. Hold on.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Is there another exit.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: The other end of the garage. But we need a fingerprint to open it.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Incoming.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Shit.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What’s happening back there.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Doing my best.

Speaker: AUTOMATED VOICE
Line: Scan hand print for gate access.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Hurry up.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I’m trying.

Speaker: AUTOMATED VOICE
Line: Scan hand print for gate access.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Shaun.

Speaker: AUTOMATED VOICE
Line: Access approved.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: They will come back once I bring her home. Prepare the men for war.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: Yes, sir.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: The first time I witnessed pure artistry. 1968. Planet of the Apes. I was sitting in the cinema next to my mum, watching mastery unfold before my very eyes. After the film, I asked her, “How did they get those monkeys to do those things.” And she patted me on the head and she said, “It’s not real, pet. It’s just acting.” That’s when I knew. If they can teach those monkeys to act that brilliantly, just imagine what I could bring to the world.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: So you became an actor because you thought the monkeys were actually…

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Riding horses. I did. Yes. When, in fact, they were simply acting as if they were riding horses. I still can’t get my head round it, to be honest.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Good for you, dude. You found your passion and went for it, and eventually used it to cripple the US government, but whatever.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Yeah. No, yeah, thanks.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Um, this is really cool and all, but how long do we have to sit here.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Morris is very clear. The way through is all about timing.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Okay, but how long are we talking. Like, hours. Days.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Friends, I am but a transitory vessel for the infinite wisdom of a creature far more advanced than we’ll ever truly understand. What he sees, what he feels of this vast, unknown universe is beyond anything our simple brains can…

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Oh. You can go.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What. Go. You can go. He says “go.”

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: You should speed up.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What. Why.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Katy, go, go, go.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Morris says, “Hard right on three.”

Speaker: Katy
Line: What.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Two…

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Hard right where.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Now.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: And left.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: It’s all about staying in the pocket.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What pocket.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: We’re in it now.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: What happens if we don’t stay in the pocket.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: The forest eats us.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Eats us. What does that mean.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: He says it eats us. Go left.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Watch your back.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Stay in the pocket.

Speaker: Katy
Line: How close is it.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Five metres.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Stay in the pocket.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What is that in feet.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Really fricking close.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Stay in the pocket.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Will you just stop saying, “Stay in the pocket”.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: One last right, then straight on to the end.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: You might wanna hurry up.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What do you think I’m doing.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: We’re not gonna make it.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: I’m coming home, Mummy.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Morris says, “Great job, everyone.” Now, all we have to do is go through that waterfall, and we’re pretty much there.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Bloody hell. I think those birds are on fire.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Really. Oh. Morris says it’s normal. They’re old mates of his.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: That’s a weird horse. What’s it looking at me for.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Hi there. I am Xu Shang-Chi. This is my sister, Xu Xialing. We’re Ying Li’s children. This is my friend, Katy.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: Get in your car and go home.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Please. You don’t understand.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Whoa.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Guang Bo. What are you doing. Put down your weapons. Shang-Chi. Xialing. I’m your aunty Nan. I’ve waited so long to meet you. You look like your mother.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Hi, I’m Katy.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Welcome to Ta Lo, Katy.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Oh, thank you.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Look who has found his way home.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: I’m not a threat. Just an entertainer. Morris can vouch for me.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: We don’t have much time. Our father is coming.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Our people have been here for over 4,000 years, preparing for something we hope will never happen. We are the keepers of the Dark Gate, sworn to protect this realm and yours from the evil that’s locked behind it.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Our dad is coming here to open that gate. He thinks you’re holding our mom there.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Why would he think that.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: She told him. He says he can hear her asking for help.

Speaker: IYing Nan
Line: Is he wearing the rings.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: He hasn’t taken them off since she died. What do they have to do with all this.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: The realm of Ta Lo stretches far beyond the shores of our small village. We have cities that surpass any in your universe, rich with culture and history. Thousands of years ago, all of our people lived in peace and prosperity, until the attack of the Dweller-in-Darkness. He came with his army, devouring every soul in their path, and with each kill, they grew stronger. After decimating our largest cities, they were headed to your universe to do the same. The leaders of Ta Lo sent their strongest warriors here to stop them from reaching the portal to your world. But our ancestors were no match for them. Until The Great Protector joined their fight and turned the tide. Together, they pushed the Dweller and his army into the Dark Gate and locked it behind them. Our people have guarded that gate ever since, empowered by the magic of The Great Protector and the gift that she gave us.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Dragon scales. Makes very good armour. Your father isn’t the first to come here to open the Dark Gate. Many have tried and failed over the centuries, and they all had one thing in common. They were lured here by the voice of something on the other side. A voice that promised them their greatest desires.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: So you think soul eaters are talking to our dad.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: They know The Ten Rings have the power to break them free.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Oh. Here you go. Oh.

Speaker: Woman
Line: To the range.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What. Okay. Um, looks like I’m gonna go deliver some dragon arrows.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Oh, you’re gonna deliver some dragon arrows.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Yeah. Make myself useful, you know. Thank you.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Let’s go see your mother.

Speaker: Katy
Line: I just love how you guys know exactly what you wanna do, and you spend your whole life getting really good at it. I wish I was more like that. It’s like every time I get moderately good at something, I just quit and start something new. But I just know my own limits, and I’m not gonna waste my time chasing something that will ultimately be a disappointment for me. That’s not me.

Speaker: Woman
Line: Guang Bo. Let her shoot. If you aim at nothing, you hit nothing.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: You were everything to her. She knew that one day you would find your way here and asked me to prepare something for your arrival.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: After losing someone like her, it’s easy to feel alone in this world. But you’re not. You are children of this family, and I welcome you home.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: You’re not in your father’s house any more. In Ta Lo, we train as equals. You’ve been in the shadows long enough, my child.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Guang Bo, you saw that. That was tight.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: My mother was the only one who could beat him. Show me how she did it.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: No, sorry. Sorry. Offside, offside.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Your mother knew who she was. Do you.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: You are a product of all who came before you. The legacy of your family, the good and the bad, it is all a part of who you are.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Stop hiding, nephew. It only prolongs the pain.

Speaker: Dweller-in-Darkness
Line: We’ll be together Soon.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: Sir. The men are ready. The passage will open at dawn.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: I’ll prepare the vehicles.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Lead with your breath. Look into your heart, the light and the dark. To know yourself, you must face them both.

Speaker: Iron Gang Leader
Line: Your husband tried to destroy us. The Iron Gang is here to repay that debt.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: My husband is not the man he used to be.

Speaker: Iron Gang Leader
Line: It doesn’t matter.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Your business with him has nothing to do with my children.

Speaker: Iron Gang Leader
Line: They can go, but someone has to pay.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Xialing. Shang-Chi. Go inside. I’m going to talk to our guests.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: But you don’t have your powers.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Shang-Chi, you have nothing to fear.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Mama. Mama.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Papa.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: She told me I could change. That I could leave my past behind.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: But she was wrong. If I hadn’t taken them off, those men wouldn’t have dared to do this. And now they will pay for it.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Where’s your boss.

Speaker: Iron Gang Man
Line: I don’t know. I swear I don’t.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Okay.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: A blood debt has to be paid by blood. Will you help me.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: We found the man responsible for killing your mother. It is your right to finish this for both of us. And when you return, we will rebuild The Ten Rings to what it once was.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Been looking everywhere for ya. You okay.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I’m not who you think I am.

Speaker: Katy
Line: You already apologised for that. We’re good…

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: That’s not what I’m talking about.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Okay. What… What is it.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: When my dad sent me to find the man who killed my mom… I told you I couldn’t go through with it. I lied. I thought that I could change my name, start a new life, pretend like it never happened. But…

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: She would hate the person I’ve become.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Your dad trained you to be an assassin when you were seven. He sent you on a hit at 14. You realise how messed up that is, right.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: My mom is dead because of him. And now he’s coming to destroy her home. A blood debt has to be paid by blood.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What are you saying.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I’m gonna do what he trained me to do. I’m gonna kill him.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: He’s here.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: No. You’re not ready. She stays here.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Are you here to help the people holding your own mother captive.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: She isn’t back there. You’re being lied to by a creature who wants to destroy us all.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Is that what they told you. I know my wife’s voice.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: I miss my sister as much as you do, but this is not the way to honour her memory.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Did you honour her when you turned her away from your gate.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: You fool. We turned you away. The sins of your past would have destroyed this place.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Be careful how you speak to me, young man. I’ve lived ten of your lifetimes. Let me pass.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: We cannot do that.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Burn it down.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Stop him.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Are you planning to stop me all by yourself.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I’m not afraid of you.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Yes, you are.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: You’ve spent your entire life afraid. Always running, always hiding.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: You were there when they came for her, and you did nothing. You stood at a window and watched her die.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: She was gone and we needed you. But you chose those damn rings over us.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: You trained your son to be a killer. Is this what you wanted.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Even if you could bring her back, what makes you think she’d want anything to do with you.

Speaker: Dweller-in-Darkness
Line: Save me. Save me, my dear.

Speaker: Dweller-in-Darkness
Line: Save me.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: I’m coming, my love.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: He breached the gate.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Those things are gonna kill us all if we don’t work together.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: You think I’m going to fall for that.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Your weapons are useless against them.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: We don’t need your help. We are the mighty Ten Rings, and any…

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: We… We should work together. Release them. Release them.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: What are they doing.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Stealing souls to feed the Dweller-in-Darkness. If it grows strong enough, it will break right through the gate. That was just the beginning.

Speaker: Woman
Line: It’s too dangerous.

Speaker: Katy
Line: I have to help my friends.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: Don’t die. Everyone to the water now.

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: To the lake. Let’s go. Let’s go.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Hey, where’s your brother.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: I was hoping you knew.

Speaker: Dweller-in-Darkness
Line: Save me.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: Aim at the sky, to win or die.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: Deep breath.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: Shang-Chi, you have nothing to fear. You have the heart of our dragon. I will always be a part of you. And your dad will too. Take everything we’ve given you and make it your own.

Speaker: Ying Li
Line: I’m so proud of you. Our family needs you. Go.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: Draw. Fire.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: You have to stop your father.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: She’s not back there, Dad.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: Get out of my way, boy.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: No.

Speaker: Trevor Slattery
Line: Calm down, mate. I’m not dead, it’s just a performance. Now get down here and play along.

Speaker: Xu Wenwu
Line: I have to save her. She’s calling to me.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I wish that were true. Dad, please. Your family needs you.

Speaker: Dweller-in-Darkness
Line: Let me out.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Shit.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: It’s headed for the village.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: If it gets our dragon’s soul, it will be unstoppable.

Speaker: Guang Bo
Line: Aim for the throat.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: You have to let me go.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Let go.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I’m not leaving you again.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Holy shit.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Go.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: Tonight, we honour those who gave their lives so we might see another day. They were more than warriors. They were our mothers and fathers, our sisters and brothers. And though we will always hold on to their memories, tonight we release them to rest with our ancestors.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Farewell, Dad.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Mum, we’ll be okay.

Speaker: Ying Nan
Line: A thousand years ago, and a thousand years from now, we will always be together.

Speaker: Katy
Line: I seriously thought we were going to die. And I’d only learned how to shoot a bow, like, a day earlier, now I’m on a battlefield, killing all these Soul Suckers with Shaun’s aunty, who’s this awesome, magical kung fu goddess.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: And I’m hanging on to The Great Protector with my sister at this point, trying not to get eaten by the Mega Soul Sucker.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Oh, the Mega Soul Sucker was such a nasty bitch.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Yeah. It was trying to eat our dragon’s soul.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Which would have allowed it to destroy the entire universe.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Yeah.

Speaker: Katy
Line: I only had one arrow left, and all I could hear in the back of my mind was my mom’s voice saying, “Just take the shot, you little mooch.” And so, I aimed right for the Sucker’s throat and I let her fly.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: She hit it dead on.

Speaker: Katy
Line: And then Shaun used the Ten Rings to do this crazy Kamehameha fireball that exploded the thing…

Speaker: Katy
Line: …and he saved the world.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Yeah, we, uh, lost some good people that day… but we made it.

Speaker: Katy
Line: We made it.

Speaker: Soo
Line: Are you done mocking me.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Oh, no. We’re not mocking you.

Speaker: Soo
Line: So where is this sister of yours.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: She’s back at my dad’s compound, shutting down his operations.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Yeah, his dad was the head of The Ten Rings for the past thousand years.

Speaker: Soo
Line: Two weeks ago, you were parking cars for tips, and you want me to believe you’re now saving the world from soul-sucking monsters. I know, you’re trying to get me back for what I said last time, but I’m not gonna apologise…

Speaker: Soo
Line: …for speaking the truth as a friend. I really meant what I said, and, in fact, I actually think this whole bit you’re doing just further proves my point. You guys are obviously…

Speaker: Soo
Line: What.

Speaker: Wong
Line: Shang-Chi. Shang-Chi.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Uh… Here. Present.

Speaker: Wong
Line: My name is Wong.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Yeah, I know, sir. I’m a huge fan…

Speaker: Wong
Line: Do you have the rings.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Uh… Yeah, yes.

Speaker: Wong
Line: Good. Let’s go, we have a lot to talk about. You too.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Me too.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I think we should…

Speaker: Katy
Line: Yeah.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Uh, we gotta go.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Yeah. I know this is, like, crazy, but I’m gonna text you, and we’ll do this again. Nice to see you, John.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: I’ll Venmo you for the…

Speaker: Wong
Line: Hmm. They don’t match any artefacts from our codex. What do you think.

Speaker: Bruce
Line: Mm, I’m not sure. They’re not vibranium. Chitauri.

Speaker: Carol Danvers
Line: Not like any alien tech I’ve seen. How long did your dad have them before he gave them to you.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Um… About a thousand years.

Speaker: Bruce
Line: Their thermoluminescence indicates they’re older than that. By a lot.

Speaker: Wong
Line: The first time you used the rings, we felt it in Kamar-Taj.

Speaker: Katy
Line: What is it.

Speaker: Carol Danvers
Line: A beacon.

Speaker: Bruce
Line: They’re sending a message.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: A message to where.

Speaker: Carol Danvers
Line: I’m so sorry. I have to deal with this. You can get my number from Bruce. It was so nice to meet you.

Speaker: Bruce
Line: Yeah, I… I don’t have her number. She… She does this a lot. Guys, stay safe. Welcome to the circus.

Speaker: Wong
Line: I know this is a lot to take in, but you’re gonna have to start getting used to that. From now on, the trajectory of your lives will be like nothing you’ve ever experienced before. And there’s no going back. You both have a long journey ahead of you. Go home, get some rest.

Speaker: Katy
Line: Yeah. That’s a good idea.

Speaker: Shang-Chi
Line: Yeah. Yeah, we probably should do that. Or…

Speaker: Katy, Wong and Shang-Chi
Line: ♪ Welcome to the Hotel California ♪ ♪ Such a lovely place ♪ ♪ Such a lovely place ♪♪ Such a lovely face ♪ ♪ Such a lovely face ♪

Speaker: Razor Fist
Line: They’re waiting.

Speaker: Xu Xialing
Line: Let’s get started. We have a lot of work to do.
